{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_MinotaurCharge}} '''A_MinotaurCharge'''
(no parameters) Does nothing if the calling actor has no current target. Otherwise, if the minotaur's special1 field is greater than 0, spawns a puff ({{Class|PhoenixPuff}} in Heretic, {{Class|PunchPuff}} in other games), gives it a vertical velocity of 2, and decreases the special1 counter. If the counter was not greater than 0, removes the SKULLFLY and INVULNERABLE flags from the calling actor (normal maulotaurs are invulnerable when charging) and breaks the charge, putting the actor in its See state. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Minotaur}} and derived classes.
